availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Clinton County resident. Tennessee native. Married Robert Smith. Mother of Richard Smith, Emberson Smith, Andrew J. Smith, Sarilda Smith, Matilda Smith, Jasper Smith, Shelby M. Smith, and Newton Smith.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-004-1309. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, District 1, p. 181. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clinton County, Albany, p. 9.
